participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, Jake enjoys exploring the outdoors and sharing his love for cooking with others.
participant_1.background: I would like to open a restaurant someday. I love creating new recipes. In my free time, I watch movies and sleep. My favorite color is hunter green. I am a personal chef.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Mary is cheerful and sociable, always looking for ways to connect with nature and others through her love of music and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: The weather here is very cold, but so beautiful in the spring. I love to hike in the summer. My favorite band is One Direction. I love to ski in the winter. My name is Mary and I'm from Colorado.

content.text: Hi Mary, my name is Jake. I'm also from Colorado.
Hi Jake, it's nice to meet you. What part of Colorado are you from?
I'm from Boulder. What about you?
I'm from Denver.
I love Denver. It's a great city.
It is. I love all the things to do in the city, but I also love going hiking and camping in the mountains.
Me too! I love the mountains.
What's your favorite hiking trail?
I really like the Flatirons Trail. It's a challenging hike, but the views are amazing.
I've been wanting to try that one.
You should! It's a great hike.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go hiking, camping, and fishing. I also love to play music.
Me too! I love playing the guitar.
That's awesome! I play the guitar too.
Really? What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is country music.
Me too! I love country music.
That's awesome! We should jam sometime.
That would be fun.
Great! I'll bring my guitar.
I'll bring mine too.
Sounds good.
